english: phonetic for 'buck(s)'; transliteration unit; used in brand names

etymology.description: 巴(bā) + 克(kè) = phonetic rendering of English “buck”.
etymology.interpretation: Combines two common transliteration syllables to approximate the English sound ‘buck’. Frequently seen in brand and personal names, e.g., 星巴克.

parts.english: buck; transliteration syllable; used in brand names

examples.chinese: 他在星巴克工作(他在星巴克工作)。
品牌名里的“巴克”只是对英语buck的音译(品牌名裡的「巴克」只是對英語buck的音譯)。
examples.pinyin: Pǐnpái míng lǐ de “Bākè” zhǐshì duì Yīngyǔ buck de yīnyì.
examples.english: The “Bākè” in the brand name is just a phonetic transliteration of the English word buck.

examples.chinese: 在一些名字里,“巴克”表示音节buck(在一些名字裡,「巴克」表示音節buck)。
examples.pinyin: Zài yīxiē míngzi lǐ, “Bākè” biǎoshì yīnjié buck.
examples.english: In some names, “Bākè” represents the syllable buck.
